name: Eleven
first_appearance: Chapter One: The Vanishing of Will Byers
quotes: Friends don't lie.
I dump your ass.
Mouth-breather.
Bad. Bad.
Pretty... good.
The gate. I opened it. I'm the monster.
I can save them.
Goodbye, Mike.
description: A young girl with powerful psychokinetic abilities who was raised in Hawkins National Laboratory. She escaped and was found by Mike, Dustin, and Lucas while they were searching for Will Byers.

name: Mike Wheeler
first_appearance: Chapter One: The Vanishing of Will Byers
quotes: She's our friend and she's crazy!
You're gonna be cool now, Will Byers.
We never would've upset you if we knew you had superpowers.
I'll never let anything bad happen to you again.
This is crazy!
You're the most incredible person in the world.
description: The leader of The Party and boyfriend of Eleven. He is protective, passionate, and strategic, serving as the group's Dungeon Master.

name: Dustin Henderson
first_appearance: Chapter One: The Vanishing of Will Byers
quotes: She's our friend and she's crazy!
Son of a bitch, you're really no help at all, you know that?
Why are you keeping this curiosity door locked?
His name is D'Artagnan. Dart for short.
I'm the brain of this operation!
Just be careful of the Demogorgon.
Never Tell Me The Odds!
description: The brainy member of The Party with a love for science, candy, and his pet Dart. He's known for his cleidocranial dysplasia, his humor, and his incredible bond with Steve Harrington.

name: Lucas Sinclair
affiliation: The Party, Hawkins High Basketball Team
first_appearance: Chapter One: The Vanishing of Will Byers
quotes: We're not going to Mirkwood on some...blind faith mission!
She's a traitor!
She's our friend and she's crazy!
Something's coming. Something hungry for blood.
You just became cool, Zoomer.
description: A member of The Party who is practical, skeptical, and protective. He was initially distrustful of Eleven but eventually became a loyal friend.

name: Will Byers
powers: True Sight (temporary psychic connection to the Mind Flayer)
first_appearance: Chapter One: The Vanishing of Will Byers
quotes: It's like I'm stuck. Stuck in the Upside Down.
He's here.
It was like something... from a nightmare.
Sometimes I feel like I'm still there.
I felt it everywhere.
description: Joyce Byers' son who was abducted to the Upside Down in 1983. His disappearance sparked the events of the series. He developed a connection to the Mind Flayer after being rescued.

name: Jim Hopper
occupation: Chief of Police (Hawkins PD), Adoptive father of Eleven
first_appearance: Chapter One: The Vanishing of Will Byers
quotes: Mornings are for coffee and contemplation.
I've seen the way you look at her. And I'm telling you now, that girl's been through hell.
Keep the door open three inches!
I know you're angry. But please, just give me a chance to explain.
No more secrets, okay?
I'm the one who gave you a life!
description: The Chief of Police in Hawkins, Indiana. He suffered the loss of his daughter Sara before adopting Eleven. He's gruff but caring, and becomes a father figure to El.

name: Joyce Byers
first_appearance: Chapter One: The Vanishing of Will Byers
quotes: This is not a normal time, right? I'm not saying it's supernatural, but I'm not saying it's natural either.
I will never stop looking for him!
I know my boy!
Do you really think I'm crazy?
Will is alive! I don't know where he is, but I know he is out there!
description: Mother of Jonathan and Will Byers. After Will's disappearance, she relentlessly searched for him and discovered she could communicate with him through Christmas lights.

name: Nancy Wheeler
affiliation: Hawkins High School, The Hawkins Post
first_appearance: Chapter One: The Vanishing of Will Byers
quotes: I'm not gonna spend the rest of my life waiting for you to wake up.
What happened to Barb?
I want to finish what we started. I want to kill it.
You want to stop Brenner? Let's stop Brenner.
description: Mike's older sister who initially dated Steve Harrington before becoming romantically involved with Jonathan Byers. She's determined and resourceful, fighting against the Upside Down threats.

name: Jonathan Byers
affiliation: The Byers Family, Surfer Boy Pizza
first_appearance: Chapter One: The Vanishing of Will Byers
quotes: You shouldn't like things because people tell you you're supposed to.
I guess what I'm saying is... you don't have to pretend to be someone you're not.
This thing, it does everything for a reason.
We're gonna get Will back.
description: Will Byers' older brother and Joyce's eldest son. A talented photographer and introverted loner who becomes involved in the fight against the Upside Down.

name: Steve Harrington
occupation: Scoops Ahoy Employee (formerly), Family Video Employee
first_appearance: Chapter One: The Vanishing of Will Byers
quotes: Ahoy ladies!
Always here to save the day.
Henderson! What are you doing?
How many children are you friends with?
Four puffs of the Farrah Fawcett spray.
Just because you don't see us does n't mean that we're not there.
description: Initially a popular jock and Nancy's boyfriend, Steve evolved into the beloved 'Mom of the group', protecting the kids and wielding his iconic nail bat.

name: Max Mayfield
first_appearance: Chapter One: MADMAX
quotes: I'm not afraid of you.
I thought you were supposed to be some kind of super spy.
We're Max and Eleven. Super best friends.
Running up that hill...
description: A newcomer to Hawkins who joins The Party. She's fierce, independent, and a skilled skateboarder. She was targeted by Vecna due to her trauma from Billy's death.

name: Billy Hargrove
first_appearance: Chapter One: MADMAX
quotes: Looks like you've got yourself some competition.
I've been waiting to meet this King Steve everyone's been telling me so much about.
I want you to build. Do you understand?
I saw it. The thing that took me.
description: Max's older stepbrother who was initially antagonistic. He was possessed by the Mind Flayer and became the main host of The Flayed before sacrificing himself to save Eleven.

name: Robin Buckley
occupation: Scoops Ahoy Employee (formerly), Family Video Employee
first_appearance: Chapter One: Suzie, Do You Copy?
quotes: How many times, mom? I told you on the phone, I'm busy!
I'm just going to walk away now.
I'm not afraid of you. I'm not afraid of anything anymore.
You rule, you know that?
description: Steve's co-worker at Scoops Ahoy and later at Family Video. She's intelligent, witty, and fluent in multiple languages including Russian. She came out to Steve as gay.

name: Murray Bauman
first_appearance: Chapter Three: The Pollywog
quotes: I am never wrong.
How do you say 'child' in Russian?
Call me a conspiracist, I call myself a realist!
I'm just saying, there are forces afoot in the universe that we can't understand.
description: An eccentric conspiracy theorist and private investigator who becomes involved with the Hawkins gang. He helped expose Hawkins Lab and accompanied Joyce to Russia.

name: Erica Sinclair
first_appearance: Chapter Two: The Weirdo on Maple Street
quotes: You can't spell America without Erica.
I'm ten, chill!
Just the facts.
Code Red!
description: Lucas's sassy younger sister who gets involved in the Starcourt Mall mission. Despite initially mocking her brother's friends, she becomes an invaluable member of the team.

name: Dr. Martin Brenner
affiliation: Hawkins National Laboratory, United States Department of Energy
first_appearance: Chapter One: The Vanishing of Will Byers
quotes: Listen, I'm going to keep you safe. I'm going to take you back home.
You've come so far. I'm so proud of you.
Eleven, you must remember. What did you see?
I made you.
description: The sinister director of Hawkins National Laboratory who raised Eleven and other children with powers. He conducted experiments on children including MKUltra-style programs.

name: Eddie Munson
occupation: Student (held back twice), Dungeon Master of Hellfire Club
first_appearance: Chapter One: The Hellfire Club
quotes: This is music!
I didn't run away this time, right?
Never change, Dustin Henderson.
Chrissy, wake up! I don't like this!
I am Dungeon Master!
description: The charismatic leader of the Hellfire Club, a D&D group at Hawkins High. He witnessed Chrissy's death by Vecna and was hunted by the town. He sacrificed himself fighting Demo-bats.

name: Argyle
first_appearance: Chapter One: The Hellfire Club
quotes: Try before you deny, brochachos!
Pineapple is good on pizza!
That's just crazy talk, broski.
Purple Palm Tree Delight.
description: Jonathan's laid-back stoner friend from California who works at Surfer Boy Pizza. He helps the California group during their journey to help Eleven.

name: Bob Newby
first_appearance: Chapter One: MADMAX
quotes: You know what I do when I have nightmares? I close my eyes, I tell myself it's all in my head.
Easy peasy!
What are you, stupid? Just run!
I love her, and I love you.
description: Joyce Byers' boyfriend who worked at Radio Shack. A kind and intelligent man who helped decode Will's drawings and sacrificed himself to save the group from Demodogs.

name: Barbara Holland
first_appearance: Chapter One: The Vanishing of Will Byers
quotes: This isn't you.
Just be careful, okay?
Nancy, I'm not really in the mood.
You're different now.
description: Nancy Wheeler's best friend who was taken by the Demogorgon and killed in the Upside Down. Her disappearance and death became a major plot point driving Nancy's actions.

name: Dmitri Antonov
first_appearance: Chapter One: The Hellfire Club
quotes: You're Jim Hopper. The American!
Everyone has something they want to protect.
Trust is a dangerous thing in this place.
description: A Russian prison guard who helped Hopper escape the Kamchatka prison. Named 'Enzo' by Hopper after a restaurant, he risked everything to help and reunite with his family.

name: Suzie Bingham
first_appearance: Chapter Eight: The Battle of Starcourt
quotes: Turn around, look at what you see...
I'm his girlfriend. His celestial girlfriend.
Planck's constant!
description: Dustin's genius girlfriend from Camp Know Where who lives in Utah. She memorably made Dustin sing the NeverEnding Story theme song before helping with the gate code.

name: Vecna
first_appearance: Chapter One: The Hellfire Club
quotes: You are the key to everything.
I am the reason for everything that's happened.
You still don't understand, do you?
It is over, Eleven. You have freed me.
This pain... it is a gift.
description: The main antagonist, originally Henry Creel/One, the first child with powers. He was banished to the Upside Down by Eleven and became Vecna, orchestrating all Upside Down attacks on Hawkins.

name: Alexei
first_appearance: Chapter Two: The Mall Rats
quotes: Woody Woodpecker!
Not strawberry. Cherry.
*speaks Russian excitedly about Slurpees*
description: A Russian scientist who defected and helped Joyce and Hopper understand the Soviet operation under Starcourt Mall. He loved Slurpees and Woody Woodpecker.

name: Terry Ives
first_appearance: Chapter Three: Holly, Jolly
quotes: Breathe... Sunflower... Three to the right, four to the left... Rainbow... 450...
Breathe...
description: Eleven's biological mother who participated in MKUltra experiments at Hawkins Lab while pregnant. Dr. Brenner took her baby and electroshocked her into a catatonic state.
